page.title: 14The Chime Child
page.content: A{chime child}is born between sunset and cockcrow between the 1st and 14th of February.This and many more legends and superstitions of the{West Country} were collected and retold by {Ruth {Tongue,}herself a chime child.For many years, while at the height of her collecting passion she lived in a remote cottage under the Quantock Hills. Her tales included those of the {Supernatural}such as {The Black Dog which forecasted death to all who saw it, and the{Woman of the Mist}who appeared on{Bicknoller Hill}or of {Calender Customs }and the Christmas {Crowcombe Mummers}and the{Triscombe } {Revel}in August when the first wort pie and cream was eaten or even { {Historical Traditions}going back to the{Fire Beacon}being kept alight to give warning of invasions.
